name: THE EASIEST TEST IN THE WORLD
name_original: THE EASIEST TEST IN THE WORLD
description:
My entry for the Wowie Jam 3.0 and I'm pretty happy that I was able to finish a prototype again... the last time was a long time ago...

Remember the goal of the Jam was "Failure is Progress", so you have to lose, to see more.

I wish everyone a lot of fun while playing and if you have any feedback please let me know :)
